reviews.text: They have lifts in building which is helpful when you have heavy baggage. Staff friendly and helpful. Can easily walk from bus station. Walking distance to town.

Small, nice,
 tidy!!! Very comfortable if it possible to say about train station, 🙂🙂🙂
Yesterday when our connecting train was cancelled a guard on the platform was very helpful an d friendly thank you once again.

When your train is 45 minutes late and so many people getting on to one train, on where sit or stand...and they still done declassife 1st class where clearly there are seats not Banbury station fault !!!but cross country trains fault TOTALLY!!!!!

Pretty alright station with nice and large lifts to provide step free access to the platforms and frequently running trains to London and Birmingham. Seating could be better on the platforms and the car parking is a bit pricey but the station has decent facilities as well such as shops on the footbridge.
